  • Uses of Actor in com.yiyonglim.Platform

    Subclasses of Actor in com.yiyonglim.Platform 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Log
    Handle log (platform) If frog step on log , move with it
    class  Turtle
    Handle turtle (platform) If frog step on turtle , move with it
    class  WetTurtle
    Handle wet turtle (platform) If frog step on wet turtle , move with it when it is floating , fall into water when it sunk
